Text: Will be fully uploaded by October 22nd, and then the download rate ought to jump up a few hundred Kb.
was curious as how to play mkv files?? PLZE HELP, THKS>> twotomed@gmail.com

Use VLC Player
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/
Alternatively, you can download a bunch of codecs, but why do that?

or use media player classic from filesharingplace.com
I prefer it because the interface is more user friendly and I never got VLC working the way I want it to. Also, MPClassic can download subtitles from opensubtitles.com
